abstract: Sanofi-Aventis is looking to line up additional financing as it mulls upping its bid for Genzyme, The Wall Street Journal reports. In the meantime, a spokesman tells Reuters that the French drug giant hasn’t changed its offer for the American biotech.
snippet: Sanofi-Aventis is looking to line up additional financing as it mulls upping its bid for Genzyme, The Wall Street Journal reports. In the meantime, a spokesman tells Reuters that the French drug giant hasn’t changed its offer for the American biot...
lead_paragraph: Sanofi-Aventis is looking to line up additional financing as it mulls upping its bid for Genzyme, The Wall Street Journal reports, citing people familiar with the situation.

headline.main: Sanofi Said to Seek More Funding for Genzyme Bid
